short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A modern redesign of the PowerSchool interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PowerSchool Revamped is here to transform your PowerSchool experience into something modern, efficient, and visually appealing. This extension upgrades the outdated look and feel of the traditional PowerSchool interface, offering a sleek and intuitive design that enhances usability for students.

With PowerSchool Revamped, navigating through grades and attendance becomes smoother and faster. The extension introduces a clean, contemporary layout with easy-to-access menus and dynamic dashboards, allowing users to find the information they need with minimal effort.

Features:
- Beautiful class page
- All-new grades and attendance layout
- Filter assignments by category 
- Filter and grades classes by current time period
